content:
Hi, I’m Damodar Patil. I’m currently on a journey to become a cybersecurity professional, with a focus on Security Operations (SOC) analysis and threat detection.
This blog is my progress log — a place where I document what I’m learning every day, break down complex concepts into simple notes, and share my experiences in building the skills needed for real-world cybersecurity.
What I’m Working On Strengthening my Linux and networking fundamentals Practicing hands-on labs on TryHackMe Learning and using tools like Wireshark, Nmap, and Metasploit Preparing for CompTIA Security+ as my first certification milestone Why This Blog? I believe learning sticks best when it’s shared. By writing here, I’m not only creating a knowledge base for myself but also hoping it helps others starting their own cybersecurity journey.
Connect with Me GitHub: github.com/DamodarPatil LinkedIn: linkedin.com/in/damodarpatil Twitter (X): x.com/damodar_83 “The best learning is consistent practice.”
summary:
Hi, I’m Damodar Patil. I’m currently on a journey to become a cybersecurity professional, with a focus on Security Operations (SOC) analysis and threat detection.

This blog is my progress log — a place where I document what I’m learning every day, break down complex concepts into simple notes, and share my experiences in building the skills needed for real-world cybersecurity.

What I’m Working On

  • Strengthening my Linux and networking fundamentals
  • Practicing hands-on labs on TryHackMe
  • Learning and using tools like Wireshark, Nmap, and Metasploit
  • Preparing for CompTIA Security+ as my first certification milestone

Why This Blog?

I believe learning sticks best when it’s shared. By writing here, I’m not only creating a knowledge base for myself but also hoping it helps others starting their own cybersecurity journey.
title: About Me

content:
Starting My Cybersecurity Journey Today marks the beginning of my documented journey into cybersecurity. I’m excited to share my learning process, challenges, and discoveries as I work toward becoming a SOC analyst.
My Goals Master Linux fundamentals and command line Develop strong networking knowledge Learn security tools and methodologies Earn CompTIA Security+ certification Build hands-on experience through labs What’s Next? I’ll be posting regularly about my progress, including:
Daily learning notes Tool tutorials and walkthroughs TryHackMe room solutions Certification study progress Let’s learn together!
summary:
Starting My Cybersecurity Journey

Today marks the beginning of my documented journey into cybersecurity. I’m excited to share my learning process, challenges, and discoveries as I work toward becoming a SOC analyst.

My Goals

  • Master Linux fundamentals and command line
  • Develop strong networking knowledge
  • Learn security tools and methodologies
  • Earn CompTIA Security+ certification
  • Build hands-on experience through labs

What’s Next?

I’ll be posting regularly about my progress, including:

  • Daily learning notes
  • Tool tutorials and walkthroughs
  • TryHackMe room solutions
  • Certification study progress

Let’s learn together!
title: Welcome to My Cybersecurity Journey
